categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Ravagor was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer operating in 0.5 ABY.

One mission in the months following the Battle of Yavin was a strike against an underwater Rebel base on the planet Aguarl 3. The destroyer launched TIE/sa bombers, including one piloted by Lieutenant Ranulf Trommer, which damaged the base and caused it to flood.
The Ravagor used its tractor beams to retrieve Trommer's bomber, which had been damaged in the attack.
